item.description:
Bid on Boston’s Hottest, Finest and Most Eligible

Want to bid on a chance to win a date with Boston’s most eligible singles and help a great cause? Then join Project Smile on Friday, September 19, 6:30-9pm at Gypsy Bar, 116 Boylston Street, Boston for the 2nd Annual Project Smile Date Auction. During this exciting fundraising event, we will be auctioning off dates with traffic stopping police officers, smoldering fire fighters and other terrific single men and women.

Attention ladies: Not only will you win a date with a great guy, you will also receive a pair of sexy high heels, courtesy of Sofft Shoes! That’s right, each guy will come with a pair of high heels for the winning lady! Sexy shoes and a hot date, what can be better than that?

Guys, don’t miss out! Boston’s beauties are waiting for you to win a date with them! Event will also feature a silent auction with two round trip AirTran airline tickets to anywhere in the continental US, Red Sox, Patriots and Celtics items, gym memberships, tickets and more.

All proceeds go directly to supporting Project Smile, the non profit organization dedicated to helping children involved in traumatic situations. Project Smile donates stuffed animals, coloring books/crayons and small toys for police officers, fire fighters and paramedics to give to children. Many of the children receiving these items were involved in car accidents, witnessed domestic violence, victims of child abuse or sick/injured. Project Smile also donates stuffed animals for children entering foster care in Massachusetts and works with elderly residents of nursing homes. Since 2003, Project smile has donated over 22,000 stuffed animals and works with 141 police and fire departments. The organization was founded by your Meet Up organizer Catherine- you can bid on her too!

Tickets are only $13 and includes a raffle entry. Tickets can be purchased at www.projectsmile.org/events.htm Tickets can also be purchased at the door. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000. This event is also posted on the Social Fun Meet Up group.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo). I will most likely be near the stage.
item.name: Project Smile 2nd Annual Date Auction
